pkgmetadata.longdescription: Detecting Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) in Text // A tool for identifying 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) and associated 169 targets in text, as described in Yingjie Li (2022) https://github.com/Yingjie4Science/SDGdetector/blob/main /paper/paper.pdf . It uses natural language processing to transform unstructured text into normalized and structured data suitable for analysis and visualization. It thus enables a unique way to monitor individuals' and organizations' commitments and efforts towards advancing SDGs and targets.
